level.text: 523.1 The Director may issue a provisional certification to an applicant forertification as an EMS provider emergency medical services personnel who doesot fully meet the requirements specified in this chapter if the Director findshat the public interest would be served by issuing the provisionalertification.
523.2 A provisional certification issued pursuant to this section may beranted for a period of up to one hundred eighty (180) days and may be renewedo more than once.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Rules of the Board of Public Welfare issued July 28, 1950; as amended oneptember 29, 1950; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 16569December 6, 2013).
